name: Harbinger Kassadin
description: Kassadin swore vengeance on all gods, good and evil, of his world and of others, when his kingdom was destroyed by an errant thought. Forging armor from the remnants of an ancient living machine, he now sees himself growing closer towards the all-powerful beings he wishes to destroy.

wikiSkinData.lore: Kassadin swore vengeance on all gods, good and evil, of his world and of others, when his kingdom was destroyed by an errant thought. Forging armor from the remnants of an ancient living machine, he now sees himself growing closer towards the all-powerful beings he wishes to destroy.
